game.name: Abyss Born
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Abyss Born is a single-player dark action RPG with survival and dungeon crawler elements. Fight various monsters, explore dangerous dungeons, trade with allies and complete quests to find a friend and face evil.
